name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years in developing high-performance applications, proficient in **TypeScript**, **React**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **CI/CD**, and **Terraform**. Demonstrated expertise in both frontend and backend development, leveraging **.NET**, **C#**, **Go**, and **Rust** to create scalable solutions.
Seasoned in building digital identity systems including **Verifiable Credentials** and **Open Banking**, as well as utilizing AI to enhance user experiences. Committed to implementing robust architectures with **Kubernetes** and aligning development with user stories and design documents to ensure clear communication and project success.
Proficient in deploying microservices and event-driven architectures, while maintaining compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in MLOps with skills in model training and orchestration using tools like MLflow and Airflow.
